arStrings.szText: {c_important}Poison Imbuementâ€™s{/c} Poisoning Duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} second.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Poison Imbued{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%|]{/c} chance to reduce the cooldown of {c_important}Poison Imbuement{/c} by {c_number}[SF_19]{/c} seconds.
Critical Strikes with {c_important}Poison Imbued{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_14} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased Poisoning damage.
